籤詩版本二:
Kunonoka kupinda nekubuda kunotsvaka mazano, kunetseka uye kunetseka pamusoro pekukonzera dambudziko
Seshiri iri kubhururukira mumusungo, zvingatora nguva yakareba sei kutiza?
詩意:
Iyi hexagram chiratidzo chekuchengeta zvinhu zvekare uye kuchinjika kune ramangwana.
Zvose hazvina kugutsikana.
解曰: Iva anochengetedza chero nguva. Kumirira kuti mukuru asvike. Kana iwe uchibvunza nezve zvese. Chinhu chikuru chichanonoka.
籤詩故事一:
◇Ji Ping akaurayiwa
Ji Ping, ane zita chairo anonzi Ji Tai, anozivikanwawo saPing, aive chiremba wehumambo muHan Dynasty.
Mugore rechishanu raJian'an (200 AD), Cao Cao akava mutungamiriri wehurumende uye haana kukoshesa mambo. kubvisa Cao Cao, akanzwa kutsamwa uye kutsamwa.
Emperor Xian akakumbira chiremba wehumambo Ji Ping kuti arape Cao Cao. Ji Ping akaverenga chirevo chakavanzika chamambo uye akatsunga kubvisa Cao Cao, saka vaviri vacho vakaronga zano pamwechete. Zvisingatarisirwi, madziro ane nzeve.Muranda wepamusha waDong Cheng, Qin Qingtong, akarohwa kamakumi mana netsvimbo naDong Cheng nekuda kwekudanana kwaakaita nemukadzi mudiki waDong Cheng.Akabata chigumbu.Paakanzwa nezvazvo,akashuma Dong Cheng uye Ji Ping kuCao Cao.
Ji Ping akatora mukana wemusoro waCao Cao ndokumuisira muchetura muchivande. Cao Cao akagamuchira zano, akateya Ji Ping, akamurwadzisa, uye akaferefeta mutungamiri. Ji Ping akaramba rufu uye akafa mushure mekubata nhanho.
聖意: Mumba unozvinetsa wega, muparidzi ari kukumbira mari, bhizinesi raparara, muchato hautore nguva refu, chirango chitanhatu, mufambi abatwa mumunda, gonye resadza raparara, zvipfuwo zvitanhatu zvawanikwa, munhu awanikwa, mhosva yeruzhinji yarasika, kutama hakuna kufamba, pfuma yaparara, chirwere chaitwa, mambure ari mugomo, guva rafa,
